description:
### 11.125 hqx

Apply a high-quality magnification filter designed for pixel art. This filter
was originally created by Maxim Stepin.


It accepts the following option:


- **`n`**
  - Set the scaling dimension:
2
for
hq2x
,
3
for
hq3x
and
4
for
hq4x
.
Default is
3
.
Set the scaling dimension: 2 for hq2x, 3 for
hq3x and 4 for hq4x.
Default is 3.
name: hqx

options.description: Set the scaling dimension: 2 for hq2x, 3 for hq3x and 4 for hq4x. Default is 3.
options.name: n
